title: Taisei Kensetsu: Vietnam Noi Bai Kuukou
synopsis: A 30-second animated commercial for the construction company Taisei. The commercial highlights Terminal 2 of Nội Bài International Airport that Taisei built in Hanoi, Vietnam.
related_anime: ['Taisei Kensetsu: Singapore', 'Taisei Kensetsu: Sri Lanka Kousokudouro', 'Taisei Kensetsu: Shin Doha Kokusai Kuukou', 'Taisei Kensetsu: Bosporus Kaikyou Tunnel']
staff: [['Shinkai, Makoto', ['Director', ' Episode Director', ' Storyboard', ' Setting', ' Editing']], ['Tanji, Takumi', ['Background Art']], ['Tsuchiya, Kenichi', ['Key Animation', ' Character Design', ' Animation Director']]]
